title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Mammals
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Mammals                Mammals        The Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area is home to over 35 species of mammals.    For a list of mammals found in the park visit the NPSpecies page. Make sure you select Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area (CHAT) and mammals in the drop down menus before clicking on the Search button. Once the list appears click on the Report/PDF button to print out a Species Checklist for the park.
